text: David William Moyes (born 25 April 1963) is a Scottish professional football manager and former player who is the manager of Premier League club Everton. ==Managerial statistics== Team From To Record Preston North End 12 January 1998 14 March 2002 Everton 14 March 2002 30 June 2013 Manchester United 1 July 2013 22 April 2014 Real Sociedad 10 November 2014 9 November 2015 Sunderland 23 July 2016 22 May 2017 West Ham United 7 November 2017 13 May 2018 West Ham United 29 December 2019 Present Total ==Honours== ===Player=== Celtic *Scottish Premier Division: 1981–82 Bristol City *Associate Members' Cup: 1985–86 Dunfermline Athletic *Scottish League Cup runners-up: 1991–92 Preston North End *Football League Third Division: 1995–96 ===Manager=== Preston North End *Football League Second Division: 1999–2000 Everton *FA Cup runners-up: 2008–09 Manchester United *FA Community Shield: 2013 West Ham United *UEFA Europa Conference League: 2022–23 Individual *LMA Manager of the Year: 2002–03, 2004–05, 2008–09 *Premier League Manager of the Month: November 2002, September 2004, January 2006, February 2008, February 2009, January 2010, March 2010, October 2010, September 2012, March 2013 *London Football Awards Manager of the Year: 2021 2022 ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish football managers Category:Footballers from Glasgow Category:Labour Party (UK) people Category:Bristol City F.C. players Category:Preston North End F.C. players
title: David Moyes
